headline.main: PETAIN URGES END OF SOCIAL STRIFE; Marshal in Broadcast Advises Employers and Labor to Sink Their Differences CAPITAL IS RELEGATED Berthelot Says Only Work and Talents Will Count in the Vichy Hierarchy

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, May 1 -- Marking the observance of the first May Day festival of his regime, Marshal Henri Philippe Petain today broadcast from the industrial town of Commentry a message of reconciliation to the workers, employers and the people of France.
abstract: Marshal Petain and Min J Berthelot urge end of soc strife; others s, May Day festival
